name: bands-overload
description: ![Bands overload Home Page Img](/public/img/readmeImage.png?raw=true) [Bands Overload](https://bands-overload.herokuapp.com/) is a Spotify music review blog. The application uses Facebook User Authentication to require a user to be logged in before they can create a new review. Once logged in, the user can enter their favorite genre, artist, and song and select "search" to display data from the Spotify API including album artwork and a link to preview the song if one is available. The information the user entered is stored in a mySQL database, and a new genre category is created for their entry and displayed on the homepage. The user can then add a new post reviewing that song, which will also be displayed on the homepage in order of the most recently added. ## MVC & CRUD This is a data-persistent, fullstack application that utilizes model/view/controller architecture, as well as CRUD:
